pr_title: [JENKINS-62698] - Restyle hyperlinks to make them look more modern and readable

timeline.message:
Adds new link styles (base and dark)

- Base link styles are used by default
- Dark links are added for now to footer links and sidebar

Solves conflicts between components and new links

- Several component styles are involuntarily changed whith the hyperlink restyles. Some examples are unwanted font-weight updates.
Sets underline for links in excerpt and alerts

timeline.bodyText: Is it fine to have both of them here?
timeline.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText: It's actually needed. Adjuncts do not go through the build pipeline and thus we need to set the fallbacks for CSS variables manually.
replies.author: fqueiruga

timeline.bodyText: @timja just a comment. I put these non-color variables in this file because I didn't know where else to put them. I'm thinking on creating a follow-up PR to rename this file to theme.less and include the font variables as well. WDYT?
timeline.author: fqueiruga
